title: Data Justice Lab
subtitle: The Data Justice Lab examines the intricate relationship between datafication and social justice, highlighting the politics and impacts of data-driven processes and big data.
text: The Data Justice Lab examines the intricate relationship between datafication and social justice, highlighting the politics and impacts of data-driven processes and big data.

title: Data For Justice Project
subtitle: This project explores the meaning of social justice in an age of datafication. It is premised on two significant developments: 1) the shift to a focus on the collection and processing of massive amounts of data across social life and 2) the increasing concern with the societal implications of such processes.
text: This project explores the meaning of social justice in an age of datafication. It is premised on two significant developments: 1) the shift to a focus on the collection and processing of massive amounts of data across social life and 2) the increasing concern with the societal implications of such processes.

title: Data + Feminism Lab
subtitle: The Data + Feminism Lab uses data and computational methods to work towards gender and racial equity, particularly as they relate to space and place.
text: The Data + Feminism Lab uses data and computational methods to work towards gender and racial equity, particularly as they relate to space and place.

title: Engagement Lab
subtitle: The Engagement Lab at Emerson College is a research-based design lab that is focused on studying and designing media and technology that is reshaping civic life.
text: The Engagement Lab at Emerson College is a research-based design lab that is focused on studying and designing media and technology that is reshaping civic life.

title: Data & Society
subtitle: Data & Society studies the social implications of data-centric technologies & automation.
text: Data & Society studies the social implications of data-centric technologies & automation.

title: Algorithmic Justice League
subtitle: The Algorithmic Justice League is an organization that combines art and research to illuminate the social implications and harms of artificial intelligence.
text: The Algorithmic Justice League is an organization that combines art and research to illuminate the social implications and harms of artificial intelligence.

title: Black in AI
subtitle: Black in AI increases the presence and inclusion of Black people in the field of AI by creating space for sharing ideas, fostering collaborations, mentorship and advocacy.
